body.name: USX MOUNT Fixed TV Wall Mount, Low Profile TV Mount for Most 37-86 Inch Flat Screen TVs, Max VESA 600x400mm Wall Mount TV Bracket Holds up to 132 lbs, Fits 16"/18"/24" Wood Studs, Quick Release Lock
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 55 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Universal TV Wall Mount】The fixed TV mount is suitable for 37-86" flat screen TVs up to 132 pounds, and with VESA of 150x150mm to 600x400mm, the mounting bracket can be widely used for most TV types and brands. Please make sure that your TV matches the above detailed information before purchasing.

【Space Saving & Low Profile】Only 1.1" away from wall, ultra slim design allows the flush TV mount to blend perfectly into the television without being obtrusive or in the way. Being installed on the wall, it also frees up a lot of spaces on the floor for storage.

【Quick Release and Lock】The heavy duty TV wall mount bracket is equipped with a drawstring on it. Just a single stretch can help you easily and quickly remove the TV from the mount or lock it in place, without any tedious operation like screwing and unscrewing.

【Easy Installation】Only 15 minutes needed, you can quickly install the TV wall hanger with the user manual instructions and videos. Comes with all necessary parts, it can be mounted on 16", 18", 24" wood studs, concrete wall or brick wall. NOTE: If you need concrete anchors, please contact us and we will arrange a shipment to you.

【Stable & Reliable】With solid 25.14" wall plate and thick bracket arms, the full metal TV wall holder is strong enough to be used. As a manufacturer with nearly 30 years of experience in this industry, we provide you with 10 years of after-sales service, and our US-based customer support is always ready to help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: USX MOUNT Fixed TV Wall Mount Customer first and quality first are our business principles. Our US-based customer support is always ready to help you. Feel free to let us know if you have any concerns prior to purchase or if you have any problems with installation. Your safety is our top priority.

MORE WALL MOUNTING OPTIONS: A concrete wall, 16"/18"/24" wood studs spacing and one piece of wall plate are all you need to feel confident with this mounting system. This fixed TV wall mount includes all standard mounting options for most 37-86 inch TVs up to 132 pounds, with VESA 150*150mm, 200*100mm, 200*200mm, 200*300mm, 300*200mm, 300*300mm, 400*200mm, 400*300mm, 400*400mm, 600*400mm available. In addition, this low-profile TV bracket is only 1.1 inches away from the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, easy to install and very solid
reviews.reviewText: Very nice, easy to install and very solidI really like it and was quick on installation.very recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good bang for Buck
reviews.reviewText: I've wallmounted a TV before, but it has been a few years. That was a 40" Westinghouse, now I was mounting a 65" TCL, very different. The details in TV's manual how to wallmount were non-existent! I had to trust the wallmount I pick would have all I need, and more. Some sell for 11-12$, this one I got for $17. It came with all I need, lots of difference size screws and spacers, and good instructions. What you do need yourself is a drill, tape measure, pencil, adjustable/monkey wrench or rachet, Stud Finder, a level (or phone app) and always a bit of luck. First add the two verticle back brackets to the TV. Can use (included) two longer screws + spaces at top of TV, and two shorter ones at the bottom, to create a downward angel to help viewing a mounted TV. This mount does not allow for adjustable up/down tilting, so this is how you created a fixed tilt. Then CAREFULLY pick wall location with stud-finder, makign sure the wallmounted brace will reach two neighboring studs. Doesn't matter as muuch to get the left/right location exact, because once TV is mounted it can slide a bit left/right, but you MUST get the height corret, or you'll have to drill again. Mark roughly with pencil upper and lower drill sites for both studs, drill one and screw in one of the included wall screws (with washer) just enough to keep wall brace hanging, use the level to make sure wall brace is level before drilling and screwing in sites 2-4. It can be hard to tighten the screws all the in due to the raises edges the TV's brackets fit into, so you can use the included short spaces if you want, I did this, but if you want to be able to slide the TV a little left/right as need, make sure scree head stays same/less raised that the track the TV hangs into. Once wall brace is in place with all 4 tightened screws, lift into place the TV, encuring both bottom connections lock into place (has a pull on release if you need to later take TV down. Thope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy installation
reviews.reviewText: Such a great mount for the price. Doesn’t sit too far off the wall. Very easy to mount and attach to the tv. Definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put up on your wall and it’s very easy to take the TV off the wall if you have to. Only took about 20 minutes to put together and TV on wall. Very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Although I didn’t personally install, the Taskrabbit worker preferred putting this wall mount in over the other I had him install. He mentioned it was easier, but the design was also better. Once he installed it, I understood why he mentioned that and started to look for a similar product with more mobility for my living room. I definitely recommend this mount for a space that you won’t do much entertainment in and has little to no light from outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good TV mount
reviews.reviewText: This mount came with everything needed for multiple tv types. The single best feature for me is the self locking and releasing clips that mount the bottom of the tv to the mount frame. We need to insure tv's are locked in place here in California due to earthquakes. On this mount, you simply have to pull the straps from each tv mount to release the tv from the frame in case you have to add/remove cables etc. Highly recommend this mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No issues with quality nor install.
